headline: Is It Too Late To Consider Buying IBM (IBM) After Its Strong Five Year Run?
summary: If you are wondering whether International Business Machines is still fairly priced after its long run, this article will help you size up what you are actually paying for today. The stock closed at US$302.72, with returns of 2.2% over 7 days, a 2.5% decline over 30 days, 3.8% year to date, 39.1% over 1 year, 132.0% over 3 years and 202.3% over 5 years. This performance has many investors rechecking what is baked into the price. Recent attention on International Business Machines has...
